## Libraries Needed
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Reading Data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("~/Beck_AI/data/data.csv")
```

```{r}
time_comp <- ggplot(data = subset(df, steps != "timeout"), aes(x = factor(index), y = time, group = type, color = type, fill = type)) +
  
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")

time_comp
```

```{r}
steps_comp <- ggplot(data = subset(df, steps != "timeout"), aes(x = factor(index), y = steps, group = type, color = type, fill = type)) +
  
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")

steps_comp
```

```{r}
nodes_exp <- ggplot(data = subset(df, steps != "timeout"), aes(x = factor(index), y = nodes_exp, group = type, color = type, fill = type)) +
  
 geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")

nodes_exp
```
